title: KURUM PADAM
description: Show off your unique ideas and perspectives through the power of movies. Craft a captivating short film that will enthrall the audience and leave them in awe of your creative artistry.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: Participants should send their short films for submission on or before February 27th, 2024
Selected short films will be screened on the day of the event.
The duration of the short films can be at a maximum of 20 minutes.
Controversial, sensitive and abusive content is not allowed.
